title: City Of Rocks National Reserve: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning        NPS staff and partners attend a general management planning session NPS Photo   Â    City of Rocks National Reserve and Castle Rocks State Park are guided and managed by comprehensive plans, both at the agency level and at the park. The following links provide a few of the current plans.  Agency Plans A Call to Action: Preparing for a Second Century of Stewardship and Engagement (NPS) Future Focus: The 2015 to 2019 Strategic Plan for the Idaho Department of Parks and Recreation  City of Rocks National Reserve Plans 2015 Draft General Management Plan 1996 General Management Plan 1998 Climbing Management Plan 1996 Grazing Management Plan 2016 Operations Plan Castle Rocks State Park Plans 2006 Castle Rocks State Park Master Plan 2003 Castle Rocks State Park Climbing Management Plan
